title: Immunizations
author: Government Websites by CivicPlus
cleaned_text: Eligibility for Vaccines at the Health Department - Texas Vaccines for Children Program - Age 2 months - 18 years - Uninsured - Underinsured - Medicaid - Of Native American or Native Alaskan Heritage - Adult Safety Net - Age 19+ Years - Uninsured - Underinsured - NOT ELIGIBLE if the adult has any insurance, including Medicare, Medicaid, and private health insurance - Adult Private Pay - Age 19+ Years - Must be covered by some form of health insurance such as Medicare, Medicaid, or private insurance Please fill out the following form for each person receiving an immunization. Midland Health Services is an Texas Vaccines for Children Provider (TVFC). Please visit the [Texas Vaccines for Children Program](https://www.dshs.texas.gov/immunize/tvfc/) website for more information.
